publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6947 Alex Neil: The Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office or Body as Specified Authority) (No.2) Order 2010—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office of Body as Specified Authority) (No.2) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*

S3M-6947 Alex Neil: The Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office or Body as Specified Authority) (No.2) Order 2010—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office of Body as Specified Authority) (No.2) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon
